# An R workflow for Simple Spatial Surveys Method (S3M) surveys

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

This repository is a template for a [`docker`](https://www.docker.com/get-started)-containerised, [`{targets}`](https://docs.ropensci.org/targets/)-based, [`{renv}`](https://rstudio.github.io/renv/articles/renv.html)-enabled [`R`](https://cran.r-project.org/) workflow for the design, data management and analysis, and reporting of Simple Spatial Surveys Method (S3M) surveys.
